title: The last champion you played...
body:
Is now President/King of wherever you live. How goes it?

{{champion:429}} Kalista..so I guess we go back to Babylonion rule, an eye for an eye, ect.

replies.body: President Leona declares that daylight savings time shall be all the time!
I hope a Rioter comments :3 let's make it possible guys
Jinx for President? Things are gonna get crazy!

Ashe!

I guess lots of feasting, drinking, and merriment in general will ensue. But her crazy sisters will always be trying to assassinate her.

{{champion:22}} "Do not confuse a 3 day work week for laziness!"
President Jarven? That doesn't sound right...

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=0EcAWj8L,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-08T01:26:42.046+0000)
>
> President Jarven? That doesn't sound right...

Especially since you can't spell his name :^)

{{champion:34}} 

California will finally get REAL SNOW :D
And she might fix global warming too!
Well, she would be the first female President... so there's something.
